mil7.6.10:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘ajagarassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.6.10:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, ajagaro mahatimahakayo bahupi divase unudaro dinataro kucchipuram aharam na labhati, aparipunno yeva yavadeva sarirayapanamattakena yapeti;
mil7.6.10:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogino yogavacarassa bhikkhacariyappasutassa parapindamupagatassa paradinnappatikankhissa sayangahappativiratassa dullabham udaraparipuram aharam, api ca atthavasikena kulaputtena cattaro panca alope abhunjitva avasesam udakena paripuretabbam.
mil7.6.10:1.4: Idam, maharaja, ajagarassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
